record.source: Applying Machine Learning in Science Education Research : When, How, and Why?
record.title: Automation and Explainability: Supervised Machine Learning with Text Data
record.abstract: In this chapter we revisit supervised ML and apply it to text data. We particularly utilize a LLM in the fine-tuning paradigm to showcase how these models can be used in science education research projects.
record.contributors: Wulff, Peter ; Kubsch, Marcus ; Krist, Christina
